reviewText: Like all Macventure games, this title can be incredibly frustrating! You WILL die......A lot! If you are familiar with Macventure games(and enjoyed ANY of them), then pick up this game! If you however have never played a Macventure game, or are easily angered/frustrated by games, then I would advise you to steer clear of this title(As well as all other Macventure games) until you have done some research.
voteText: 11 of 12 people (92%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Not as good as the original, by any means, but still awesome.

The big flaw I saw in this one was the hidden time limit on accomplishing your mission, and if you ever saved during the game you're only gonna fail a thousand times as you try to beat that time limit.

reviewText: I really loved Deja Vu on my c64 when I was a kid, so I hoped this version will bring back some of those memories, but for me the interface is terribly broken, scroll arrows are missing, the context menu is empty, fonts are too big and the file menu in the upper left corner doesn't work.

reviewText: Absolutely great game!\n\nAlso check out the Windows version. It has better graphics.

This game is classic. Found myself laughing and laughing each time I did something stupid and random. I still remember playing the originals and brings back memories even in real life where I made similar choices. Be prepaid for MisAdventures!!
